data.title: Furniture Store in Dallas, TX
data.meta_description: Visit the Grand Prairie, TX store and find a wide selection of affordable furniture and home goods!

Hej, welcome to the IKEA Grand Prairie store!

At IKEA Grand Prairie, we pride ourselves in having high-quality items at an affordable price to create home furnishing inspiration for your everyday life at home. We have solutions big or small from organizing your playroom, planning your Texas-sized kitchen or dream closet! IKEA Grand Prairie has what you need!

Between family activities and events, Småland, our free children's play area, and our delicious Swedish restaurant - there is always something happening at IKEA Grand Prairie!

We hope to see y'all soon!

Patrick

Store Manager

Local in-store deals

Save 15% on select sleep essentials

Ready to join the goodnight club? IKEA Family members get 15% off purchases of $300 or more (pre-tax) on bed frames, mattresses, comforters and more sleep comfort essentials during the IKEA complete sleep event until 9/10/24. Discount applied at checkout.*

Not a member? Join IKEA Family for free now.

Shop sleep essentials

Local IKEA Family in-store offers

As an IKEA Family member, you receive exclusive discounts on products throughout the store.

Last Chance

Hurry, shop these popular products before they're gone for good.

The As-is section is now online!

IKEA Family members, it’s now easier than ever to browse and shop your local store’s As-is section of gently used furniture, discontinued items and more affordable furnishings online. Happy As-is shopping!

Popular categories

Swedish meatballs

Served with mashed potatoes & Lingonberry jam

Salmon fillet

Served with cauliflower rice and red pepper relish

Chicken tenders

Served with french fries

Hej Friday - Get 50% off entrées every Friday!

Slide into the weekend with 50% off adult entrées at your local IKEA store’s Swedish Restaurant every Friday until 8/31/24. Bring an appetite and a few hungry friends who love half priced meatballs, plant balls, salmon filet meals and more.

Daily Restaurant deals for IKEA Family members!

Monday: Go meatless with 8-piece veggie & plant ball plates for $3

Tuesday: Get any hot entrée for $3.99

Wednesday: Get 2 free kid’s entrées when you buy 1 adult entrée

Thursday: Get $1 off Swedish meatballs

Friday: All customers get 50% off all hot entrées

See full Terms & Conditions*

Appetizing prices, all day long!

Mac and cheese for only $3.99

Spend less on a delicious, comfort food classic! Enjoy an adult mac and cheese meal for the affordable price of just $3.99.

It’s o-fish-ial: Salmon prices are down

Spend even less on a healthy meal at the Swedish Restaurant with New lower prices on all salmon entrées! Visit your local store for prices.

IKEA Family

Everyone saves more every day with IKEA Family. Joining is the best way to make the most of your IKEA experience. Check out these great benefits to learn how you’ll be getting more for less today!

Join IKEA Family

Join IKEA Family

It’s all happening now at IKEA Grand Prairie!

All year round, we offer various activities and events. For example, workshops on the layout of the house, or activities for children during school holidays. Check our events regularly.... we add them all the time.

Exclusive local partnership offers for IKEA Family members

Fort Worth Zoo

From flamingos to tigers to baby elephants, every visit to the Fort Worth Zoo is a fun-filled adventure for the whole family. IKEA Family members now receive $2 off one-day admission to the Fort Worth Zoo when using code "IKEA23" at ticket checkout.

*Tickets must be purchased online using discount code IKEA23. Tickets are valid for one-time admission only. This offer cannot be combined with any other offer and is not valid for special events. Not valid on half-price Wednesdays. Not valid for parking. Discount code valid Sept. 19, 2023, through Sept. 30, 2024. No extensions will be given on expired tickets.

Firehouse Gastro Park

Firehouse Gastro Park (located at 321 W. Main Street in Grand Prairie, TX) now offers IKEA Family members discounts on indoor and outdoor space rentals as well as 15% off food and non-alcoholic drink purchases!

Specializing in hosting national and regional live music, the 20th Century Fire Station No. 1 remains at the heart of this beautiful place to kick back and spend the perfect day.

*By presenting their physical or digital IKEA FAMILY card in person at Firehouse Gastro Park located at 321 W Main St, Grand Prairie, TX 75050, IKEA Family members will receive 15% off food and drink purchases (excluding tax). Not valid with any other FIREHOUSE GASTRO PARK promotion or discount. Offer valid once per day. Dine-in only. IKEA FAMILY members can also receive up to $200 off space rental(s) of (3) hours or more that are valued at $1,200 or more (excluding tax), depending on space location. Not valid with any other FIREHOUSE GASTRO PARK promotion or discount. Offer valid once per day and subject to availability.

Click & Collect Order Pick-Up

What you need to know

Pick your order up at your earliest convenience.

We'll hold your order for 24 hours, after that it will be canceled.

Make sure you have enough space in your vehicle to fit your order.

Where to go

For curbside pick-up:

Follow the signs for the Click & Collect Order Pick-Up area to the West side of the building (161 Side).

Park in the numbered loading area on the side of the building and check-in.

Wait in your vehicle and we will be out with your order shortly.

Once you’ve arrived, let us know you’re here

How was your Click & Collect experience?

Click here to let us know how we're doing.

Returns & exchanges

On your way here for a return, spare part, or customer service issue? Find out how to easily return or exchange your products.

Services to help you shop

At IKEA, you can do everything yourself. From collecting all your products in-store, to transporting and assembling them. But of course, you don't have to. IKEA offers a wide range of useful services to help you purchase, transport and assemble your products.

Buy Back & Resell

Have IKEA furniture that needs a new home? IKEA Family members can sell select gently used IKEA furniture in exchange for in-store credit!

Learn more

Skip the line and save time!

Introducing Shop & Go! Download the IKEA app before arriving at the store, and while you shop, you can scan your items and pack them in your bag. Then just pay at the dedicated checkout lanes on your way out. No lines, no hassle!

Download the app

Delivery by Taskrabbit

Same and next-day delivery

Taskrabbit provides fast and convenient same-day and next-day delivery within a one-hour time window that works for you. A co-worker can help you set up your purchase for delivery, or click here to book yourself.

Planning services at IKEA Grand Prairie

Schedule your free PAX planning appointment

Make your dreams of custom closet solutions come true with PAX. Our wardrobe system is customizable inside and out: you choose the size, color, style, and sliding or hinged doors.

Meet with one of our specialized wardrobe and closet experts for one hour of dedicated planning time. We offer both in-store and virtual planning. Our in-store home furnishing experts will assist you in planning your dream storage solution. ​​

Schedule now

Schedule a FREE Kitchen Planning consultation

Everyone deserves their dream kitchen. That’s why we offer a wide range of professional kitchen services, including planning, measuring, delivery and installation. We’re here to help with every step of your kitchen remodel project, so let’s get started.

We offer both in-store and virtual planning. Our in-store kitchen experts are ready to assist in planning and purchasing your complete dream kitchen for your home.

Click here to get started

IKEA Grand Prairie in the community

Being a good neighbor and demonstrating commitment to our local community is an essential part of who we are at IKEA. Our priority is to take an active hands-on approach to serving the needs of our community by creating impactful actions that will be a part of real lasting change. As a company that deeply cares about people and the planet, we are guided by a simple yet powerful IKEA vision of creating a better everyday life for the many people.IKEA Grand Prairie has committed to dedicating resources to helping our most vulnerable populations in Dallas and Fort Worth- the at-risk, the homeless and youth. Here are some of our recent contributions in our local community:

Donated furniture to Mentors Care

Furnished and donated goods for underprivileged youths with Create & Co

Participated in the 2022 Dallas Pride Parade.

Donated mirrors to The Kindness Campaign for their Magic Mirror Project

Remodeled a family shelter home with Family Promise of Irving• Donated relief kits to Red Cross in 2021

Refreshed South Hills Elementary Teachers Lounge

Donated to the Lorenzo De Zavala Environmental Science Academy chemistry program.

Teacher Lounge Makeover with the Welman Project

Unbound North Texas youth center donation

Furnished ReInspire’s Community Resource Center

We at IKEA Grand Prairie were recently awarded for our strong community efforts:

Recognized by the city of Grand Prairie as a Clean Prairie Gold Certified Company in 2022

Awarded second place by Adopt a Stream for most tonnage collected in 2021.

Won the 2022 Clean Prairie Award in recognition of our sustainable action in the community.

Won the 2022 Friends of the Environment Award

Store features & amenities

Frequently Asked Questions

We love pets, but we don't allow them in our stores. We do welcome fully trained, ADA-qualified service animals to shop with you. Animals whose sole function is to provide comfort or emotional support do not qualify as service animals under the ADA.

We offer family parking spaces close to the entrance of the store to make the transition from the parking lot into the store with your little ones much quicker. We offer handicapped parking spots at the Store Entrance.

We currently offer 3 EV charging stations located at the Store Entrance

We have wheelchairs available upon request in our Store Entrance Lobby. Our greeter will gladly assist you!

Yes, motorized scooters are available upon request in our Store Entrance Lobby on a first come, first served basis.

The Click & Collect Order Pick-Up and Furniture Pick-Up areas can be found on the left (West) side of the building in section K.

At IKEA Grand Prairie we strive to keep the importance and needs of families top of mind. Here are a few examples of simple ways we try to make your visit to IKEA Grand Prairie a great one!

We offer family parking spaces close to the entrance of the store to make the transition from the parking lot into the store with your little ones much quicker.

We offer shopping strollers in our Store Entrance with a seat for your little one so they can experience IKEA with you!

We offer baby care rooms in the store entrance and the hallway next to the restaurant. Our baby care rooms offer a diaper changing space along with a comfortable space if you need to feed your little one.

Did you forget the diaper bag in the car? Visit our greeter if you need a diaper while you are shopping.

You can also visit our greeter to get a Scavenger Hunt for your little ones to do during your shopping experience (For ages 16 and under). Turn it into our Bistro at the exit to redeem for a free frozen yogurt!

Throughout the year, we offer many Family-friendly activities, workshops and events for our IKEA Family members! Not a member? Sign up today!

In our Swedish Restaurant we offer:

Highchairs

Bottle Warming Station

Kids Meals

Play Area

IKEA Grand Prairie is located off of Mayfield and SH 161 Frontage Road

IKEA Grand Prairie is located off of PGBT (President George Bush Turnpike) at the Mayfield exit, North of I-20 and South of I-30. If you are coming from I-20 you can take PGBT, or 161 Frontage and IKEA will be on your right before Mayfield. If you are coming from I-30 you can head south until you see the Mayfield exit, make a left at the light and IKEA will be on your right.

From Dallas: Take I-30 West to PGBTP South or 161 South, Exit at Mayfield Road, turn left and enter IKEA on your right

From Fort Worth: Take I-20 East to PGBTP North or 161 North, Exit at Mayfield Road, IKEA is on your right

From Waco: Take I-35E South to I-20 West, I-20 West to 161 North Exit turn right onto 161, IKEA is on your right before Mayfield Road

From Frisco: Dallas North Tollway South to PGBTP South to Mayfield Road, left on Mayfield, IKEA is on your right

Need help getting to/from IKEA Grand Prairie? Do so with the convenience of Via Grand Prairie, our city's on-demand, shared transportation service. Think of it as a minibus that comes when you want, where you want – give them your pickup and drop-off address and they’ll provide a few ride options. Choose the option that works best for you, and they will send a driver your way. We can't wait to see you! Learn more

IKEA Grand Prairie is located 1.8 miles from Traders Village and is across the highway from Epic Central! IKEA Grand Prairie is 3.4 miles from Grand Prairie Premium Outlets. IKEA Grand Prairie is 7.4 miles from Six Flags in Arlington.

4.9 miles from Downtown Grand Prairie

20 miles from Downtown Dallas

23 miles from Downtown Fort Worth

No, however, our store is accessible to Uber, LYFT and other 3rd party ride share services.

Need help getting to/from IKEA Grand Prairie? Do so with the convenience of Via Grand Prairie, our city's on-demand, shared transportation service. Think of it as a minibus that comes when you want, where you want – give them your pickup and drop-off address and they’ll provide a few ride options. Choose the option that works best for you, and they will send a driver your way. We can't wait to see you! Learn more

IKEA Frisco

Store

7171 IKEA Drive

Frisco, TX 75034

Visit store page

About the IKEA Grand Prairie furniture store

Discover IKEA Grand Prairie, your affordable furniture haven near Dallas, Fort Worth, and Arlington, Texas! Since 2017, we've been serving Grand Prairie; we’re conveniently located off Interstate 20 and Highway 161, adjacent to Epic Waters waterpark and Grand Prairie Premium Outlets, less than 25 miles from Dallas, Fort Worth, and Arlington.

Explore a wide range of affordable furniture and storage solutions for every room in your home—bedroom, living room, bathroom, dining room, home office, outdoor spaces, plus kitchen cabinets and appliances.

Don't miss the IKEA Grand Prairie Restaurant, occasionally hosting live local music performances, offering Swedish meatballs, sweet treats, vegetarian options like plant balls, and other delightful IKEA dishes.

Whether you're organizing your space, furnishing your first apartment, or seeking stylish home additions, IKEA Grand Prairie is your ultimate destination!
